dataAccessProperties: Available: stated as available, but unable to access
dataAccessDetails: http://ngos.moec.gov.af/Public/Default.aspx - button for Excel download, but not found to be working
onlineAccessDetails: The system provides an online interface to browse a list of organisations. An 'Export to Excel' option is presented, but does not appear to work.
description: NGOs wishing to operate in Afghanistan must register with the NGOs Department of the Ministry of Economy. The register contains government departments, national NGOs and international NGOs.
name: Ministry of Economy NGO Department / وزارة الاقتصاد  انسجام موسسات غیر دولتی
